short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to right click on text from a page and tweet it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tweet Text is a simple and convenient tool that lets you easily tweet any text that you come across while browsing the web. Just select the text that you want to tweet and right-click to open a new window with a tweet containing the selected text. No need to copy and paste or manually type out the text. This extension is perfect for quickly sharing quotes, jokes, or other interesting content with your followers. Install Tweet Text now and make tweeting a breeze!
